name: SuncoSmartLighting
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Sunco Smart Lighting gives you comprehensive, hands-free control over your smart products with a wide variety of voice command options. Simply ask Alexa, and let your Sunco Smart Products take care of the rest.
Connect Alexa to your Sunco Smart Products in just a few simple steps:
(1). Download our Sunco Smart Lighting app in Google Play or the iOS App Store, then log in or register a new account.
(2). Pair each Sunco Smart product using the Sunco Smart Lighting app, then group or rename the products as needed. If you rename a smart product or group, Alexa will use this new name after discovering the devices in Step 7.
(3). Download the Amazon "Alexa" app from the Amazon Market, Google Play or the iOS App Store. Connect Echo with the Alexa app.
(4). Search for “Sunco Smart Lighting” from the skills category in the Alexa app.
(5). Enable the “Sunco Smart Lighting” skill, and you'll be navigated to the Sunco Smart Lighting login page.
(6). Follow the instructions on the page to complete the linking process.
(7). Once the setup is finished, you can control your Sunco Smart Products using voice commands like these:
“Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, brighten the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 50%.”
"Alexa, set bedroom light to green."
"Alexa, set bedroom light to cool white."
